name: amasty/module-shipping-restrictions-subscription-package
description: Shipping Restrictions Subscription Package by Amasty

suggest.amasty/module-ship-restriction-hyva: Install module-ship-restriction-hyva module to activate the integration with Hyvä Theme.
suggest.amasty/module-ship-restriction-hyva-chec: Please install this package to ensure compatibility between the Shipping Restrictions extension and the Hyvä Checkout.
suggest.amasty/module-shiprestriction-restricted: Install this package to configure the restricted products displaying in the restriction message.
